TopicTitle: Can someone help me make an aircraft carrier?

Articles.Content:
So today i was trying to make a landing platform like a aircraft carrier, could any one create one that can be drove into the sea using carts and then move with engines or one that can be flown and ejected from a plane?

Thanks.

Unfortunately you can only create a VTOL aircraft carrier, because if the landing gear contact the ship at more 10m/s they will explode.

But yes, VTOL carrier, maybe possible, a true carrier though is a different story.
man, id LOVE to see that happen. Maybe with the panels mod it would be possible... I shall give it a try. I am very doubtful though. lol.

I don't think it is madspy, How-to gets abused with this kind of stuff a lot so that's probably where this should be, at least it'll be among similar threads even if it's still not really the "right" place for this.
Hmm mayby try getting a huge lifting plane to drop it into the water?

Hmm mayby try getting a huge lifting plane to drop it into the water?

Getting it to the water shouldnt be an issue... I have some carts plugin and parts that has large wheels with suspension. Could just load the sides with those, then have a decoupler to lose them once in the water.

Would just need 2 things. A TON of wheels, and to get off the runway to avoid the drop at the end.
